product_name: Blackburn Super Flea USB Rear Bike Light
long_description: Thanks to a bright red LED bulb and a specially designed lens, the Blackburn Super Flea USB rear bike light offers excellent performance to increase your visibility as you ride. Superbright red LED bulb is paired with a special lens to deliver bright light across a wide area, enhancing your visibility to oncomers. Magnetic USB charger uses magnets to transfer electrical current between USB connector and the light, eliminating cables and ports and enabling watertight design. Battery level gauge/charging indicator provides at-a-glance info on power levels. Rear clip and removable silicone strap allow the Super Flea USB rear bike light to be mounted securely to a number of places, including your bike, helmet, clothing or bag.
short_description: Thanks to a bright red LED bulb and a specially designed lens, the Blackburn Super Flea USB rear bike light offers excellent performance to increase your visibility as you ride.
